string.name: protectionTipsString
string.li: Always be aware of your surroundings and trust your instincts.
Keep your phone charged and easily accessible.
Share your location with a trusted friend and family member.
Carry a personal safety alarm or whistle.
Avoid sharing personal information with any strangers.

string.name: safety_tips_alone
string.item: Stick to Well-Lit and Populated Areas: Avoid walking alone in deserted or poorly lit areas, especially at night.\n\n
Plan Your Route: Know where you\'re going and how you\'ll get there before you head out.\n\n
Trust Your Gut: If a situation feels unsafe, remove yourself from it. Don\'t be afraid to change course or call for a ride.\n\n
Limit Distractions: Avoid wearing headphones with loud music or being engrossed in your phone while walking alone. Stay alert to your surroundings.\n\n
Carry Less Valuables: Take only what you need and avoid carrying large sums of cash or expensive jewelry.\n\n
